label: Instructions
description: # Model Component Documentation\n\nThis template documents individual components of your climate model as required for CMIP7 participation. Each component description enables traceability across different models, supports scientific evaluation, and is mandatory for publishing model data to ESGF. The information you provide helps the climate modeling community understand your component's scientific basis, track how components are shared between institutions, and ensure proper attribution in research studies.

label: Component
description: Select the process that this model component simulates.\n\nMANDATORY field from Model component process CV.

label: Name
description: The name of the model component.\n\nMANDATORY field.

label: Family
description: The name of the family of models that the model component belongs to.\n\nMANDATORY field.

label: Description
description: A scientific overview of the model component.\n\nMANDATORY field.
placeholder: Provide a scientific overview summarizing key processes simulated, scientific basis, and MIP-relevant details.

label: References
description: ## References\n\nMANDATORY: Each reference must include both Citation and DOI properties.

label: Reference 1 - Citation
description: Human-readable citation for the primary component reference.\n\nMANDATORY field.

label: Reference 1 - DOI
description: The persistent identifier (DOI) for the primary component reference.\n\nMANDATORY field.

label: Code Base
description: A URL (preferably DOI) for the source code.\n\nMANDATORY field. Set to 'private' if not publicly available.

label: Embedded In
description:
Select the model component(s) in which this component is embedded.

Select all that apply.

OPTIONAL field from Model component process CV.

label: Coupled With
description:
Select the model component(s) to which this component is coupled.

Select all that apply.

OPTIONAL field from Model component process CV.

label: Native Horizontal Grid
description: ## Native Horizontal Grid\n\nMANDATORY compound object describing the component's horizontal grid.

label: Grid
description: The horizontal grid type.\n\nMANDATORY field from Native horizontal grid Type CV.

label: Description (Optional)
description: Free-text description of the horizontal grid.\n\nOPTIONAL field.
placeholder: Additional horizontal grid details if needed

label: Grid Mapping
description: The coordinate reference system of the horizontal coordinates.\n\nMANDATORY field from Grid Mapping CV.

label: Region
description: The portion of the globe where horizontal grid calculations are performed.\n\nMANDATORY field from Region CV.

label: Temporal Refinement
description: How the distribution of grid cells varies with time.\n\nMANDATORY field from Temporal refinement CV.

label: Arrangement
description: Grid arrangement of orthogonal physical quantities.\n\nMANDATORY field from Arrangement CV.

label: Resolution X
description: Horizontal resolution in X direction (float).\n\nOPTIONAL field.

label: Resolution Y
description: Horizontal resolution in Y direction (float).\n\nOPTIONAL field.

label: Horizontal Units
description: Units for resolution_x and resolution_y.\n\nOPTIONAL field - Required if resolution_x or resolution_y are set.

label: N Cells
description: Total number of grid cells.\n\nMANDATORY integer field.

label: N Sides
description: Number of cell sides (edges) for unstructured grids.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field.

label: N Vertices
description: Number of vertices (nodes) for unstructured grids.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field.

label: Truncation Method
description: Method for truncating spherical harmonic expansion.\n\nOPTIONAL field from Truncation method CV.

label: Truncation Number
description: Truncation number for spectral grids.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field.

label: Resolution Range (km)
description:
Minimum and maximum resolution in km.

MANDATORY field as [float,float].

Format: min, max

label: Mean Resolution (km)
description: Mean resolution in km.\n\nMANDATORY float field.

label: Nominal Resolution
description: Nominal resolution characterizing the grid.\n\nMANDATORY field from Nominal resolution CV.

label: Native Vertical Grid
description: ## Native Vertical Grid\n\nMANDATORY compound object describing the component's vertical grid.

label: Coordinate
description: The coordinate type of the vertical grid.\n\nMANDATORY field from Coordinate CV.

label: Description (Optional)
description: Free-text description of the vertical grid.\n\nOPTIONAL field.
placeholder: Additional vertical grid details if needed

label: N z
description: Number of grid cells in Z direction.\n\nOPTIONAL integer field. Must be omitted if n_z_range is set.

label: N z Range
description:
Minimum and maximum number of Z grid cells for variable resolution.

OPTIONAL field as [integer,integer]. Must be omitted if n_z is set.

Format: min, max

label: Bottom Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of bottom model layer.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Top Layer Thickness
description: Thickness of top model layer.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Top of Model
description: Value of upper boundary of top model layer.\n\nOPTIONAL float field.

label: Vertical Units
description: Physical units for thickness and boundary values.\n\nOPTIONAL field - Required if any thickness/boundary values are set.

label: Issue Type
description: This is pre-set and cannot be changed.

label: Issue Kind
description: Select whether this is a new submission or modification of existing entry.
